{{html:
<div ng-controller="CloudSpaceManagementController">
	<h1>Settings for Cloud Space {[currentAccount.name]} / {[cloudSpace]}</h1>
	<br>
	<tabset class="clear-both">

		<tab id="access" heading="Access Management">
			<div id="access" class="tab-pane">
}}
			{{include:CloudSpaceAccessManagement}}
{{html:
			</div>
		</tab>
		<tab id="details" heading="Details">
			<div id="details" class="tab-pane active" >
				<div class="clearfix margin-bottom-medium">
					<label class="left margin-right-medium settings-label">Secret API Key:</label>
					<p class="txt-14 txt-gray">{[ cloudSpaceDetails.secret]}</p>
				</div>
				<br/>
				<div class="margin-bottom-medium" ng-switch="currentSpace.location.toLowerCase()" ng-show="currentSpace.location">
          			<label class="left margin-right-medium settings-label">Location:</label>
          			<div class="txt-center margin-bottom-large left" ng-switch-when="ca1">
          				<img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/canada.png">
          				<span class="block margin-top-small txt-13">Canada</span>
          			</div>
          			<div class="txt-center margin-bottom-large left" ng-switch-when="us1">
          				<img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/usa.png">
          				<span class="block margin-top-small txt-13">United States</span>
          			</div>
					<div class="txt-center margin-bottom-large left" ng-switch-when="test1">
						<img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/black-flag.png">
						<span class="block margin-top-small txt-13">Test</span>
					</div>
        		</div>
				<br><button class="btn margin-top-large clear-both block" ng-click="deleteCloudspace()"><i class="fa fa-trash"></i> Delete Cloud Space</button>
				<script type="text/ng-template" id="deleteCloudSpaceDialog.html">
					<form name="destroyform" ng-submit="cancelDeletion()">
						<div class="modal-header">
								<h3>Delete Cloud Space?</h3>
						</div>
						<div class="modal-body">
								<input type="hidden" value="hiddenmarker" name="hiddencsmarker"/>
								Deleting a Cloud Space is irreversible and <br/>
								all data and authorizations to it will be removed.
						</div>
						<div class="modal-footer">
								<button type="button" class="btn ok" ng-click="ok()">Ok</button>
								<button type="submit" id="canceldelete" class="btn btn-primary" autofocus>Cancel</button>
						</div>
					</form>
				</script>
			</div>
		</tab>
	</tabset>
</div>
}}
